body_html:
I confirm with "-march=native -mtune=native", due to Eigen AVX512 failure (which we are fixing), will reproduce the bug.
So, the current workaround is to please temporarily use "-march=broadwell" (i.e. for Eigen pass, do not use AVX512). Please be assured that when code is executing in MKL-DNN pass, AVX512 will be used automatically if SKX is used.
body_text:
I confirm with "-march=native -mtune=native", due to Eigen AVX512 failure (which we are fixing), will reproduce the bug.
So, the current workaround is to please temporarily use "-march=broadwell" (i.e. for Eigen pass, do not use AVX512). Please be assured that when code is executing in MKL-DNN pass, AVX512 will be used automatically if SKX is used.
body:
I confirm with "-march=native -mtune=native", due to Eigen AVX512 failure (which we are fixing), will reproduce the bug. 
So, the current workaround is to please temporarily use "-march=broadwell" (i.e. for Eigen pass, do not use AVX512). Please be assured that when code is executing in MKL-DNN pass, AVX512 will be used automatically if SKX is used.
